name: The Sword of Gryffindor
description: Gleaming silver sword made of goblin-forged steel with a ruby-studded hilt
magicalProperties: Contains properties only goblin-made armour possesses and will take on the power of substances it touches
purpose: A powerful weapon that has been presenting itself to Gryffindors in times of need for centuries
whoMadeOrFirstOwnedIt: This is a matter of some dispute between wizards and goblins
whenItWasMade: Forged a thousand years ago by Ragnuk the First, king of the goblins
